requirement.title: Motor Command Execution
requirement.description: The EP shall react on every motor command in at most $\SI{20}{\milli\second}$.

requirement.title: Motor Characterization
requirement.description: The EP shall react to motor commands in a deterministic manner, only influenced by the command, the load of the motor and the battery voltage. The influence of all other factors should be less than $10\%$ under normal operating conditions. TODO what are those?

requirement.title: Energy Storage
requirement.description: The EP shall provide sufficient energy for $\SI{2}{\hour}$ at cruise speed.
